hackathon-description-text: HackISU VIII - Iowa State University's best hackathon yet!
hackathon-rules: All projects must be original work, and completed during the 36-hours of HackISU. Any libraries/branched projects must be described in submission and voiced during demos!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The best software hack at HackISU VIII will win:

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Workiva: Best use of Cloud Technology
Rockwell Collins: Best use of communications over devices
Vermeer: Road to Autonomy: Best Machine Vision App

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Best use of the Mixmax API:
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Mixmax: Best Use of the Mixmax API
MLH: Best Internet-of-Things Hack using a Dragonboard
MLH: Best Use of Amazon Web Services
MLH: Best Domain Name from Domain.com

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2710 S Loop Dr, Ames, IA 50010, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How technically impressive was the hack? Was the technical problem the team tackled difficult? Did it use a particularly clever technique or did it use many different components? Did the technology involved make you go "Wow"?

Did the team put thought into the user experience? How well designed is the interface? For a website, this might be about how beautiful the CSS or graphics are. Is it easy to use or does it use a cool interface?
Does the hack work? Did the team achieve everything they wanted?
Did the team stretch themselves? Did they try to learn something new? What kind of projects have they worked on before?

hackathon-location-address: 2710 S Loop Dr, Ames, IA 50010, USA
hackathon-location-description: Vermeer Applied Technology Hub /  ISU Startup Factory
